title: Number Twelve
description: Have you ever noticed how the number twelve is everywhere in our daily lives? If not, this book will quickly point out to the reader how twelves are the foundation of many of the things we count and measure.
meta: bend, daylight, dozen, length, measure, ruler, shadow, sundial, width
